dir.name: [B]THIS CONTENT IS ABOUT PROVIDING INFORMATION TO YOU. HIGHLIGHT ITEM BUT DO NOT SELECT ITEM, SOME ITEMS SCROLL .... JUST LIKE THIS .... [/B]

[COLOR aqua]Keep updated ..... on issues affecting OpenView service ..... check your test video plays ..... if test video plays check your internet connection .....[/COLOR][COLOR lime] contact openviewhelp@gmail.com .....[/COLOR][COLOR aqua] Enjoy ..... [/COLOR]
[COLOR magenta]MAGENTA = SEVERE[/COLOR] ... [COLOR yellow]YELLOW = MODERATE[/COLOR] ... [COLOR lime]GREEN = INFO[/COLOR]
[COLOR yellow]EarthCam .... 30th March .... Only Featured CAMS working .... [/COLOR]
[COLOR yellow]MashUp .... 30th March .... In the middle of some big changes .... causing a few issues[/COLOR]

[COLOR lime]MashUp .... BillionUploads server works on third attempt .... HugeFiles server issuing captchas, just try a few times and they will go[/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]General .... Buffering is more likely at weekends (Sundays!) because of heavier traffic.[/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]Recommendation .... Hackermils on MashUp, Freshout is a great starting point[/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]Recommendation .... The New Pirate Bay on MashUp, Best of British is a fantastic collection of content[/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]Recommendation .... Super Search on MashUp is amazing, it can take a bit of time. Your searches will also be saved to make things easier[/COLOR]
